UpdateSourceArgs: -NoProfile -Command $l=@{'.\Windows_AppData'='C:\Users\amp\AppData';'.\Windows_Documents'='C:\Users\amp\Documents'}; foreach($n in $l.Keys){$t=$l[$n]; if(!(Test-Path $n)){Write-Host "Creating $n -> $t"; New-Item -Path $n -Target $t -ItemType Junction | Out-Null}else{Write-Host "$n exists"}}

-NoProfile -Command $l=@{ '.\Windows_AppData'="$env:USERPROFILE\AppData"; '.\Windows_Documents'="$env:USERPROFIL\Documents" }; foreach($n in $l.Keys){ $t = $l[$n]; if(Test-Path $t){ if(!(Test-Path $n)){ Write-Host ('Linking ' + $n + ' to ' + $t); New-Item -Path $n -Target $t -ItemType Junction | Out-Null } else { Write-Host ($n + ' exists') } } else { Write-Warning ('Target ' + $t + ' not found on Host!') } }"
